level.heading: New York city energy advisory committee.
level.text: 28-1001.3.2 New York city energy advisory committee. The commissioner shall establish a New York city energy conservation code advisory committee to provide advice and recommendations regarding such code and revisions thereto. Such committee shall include registered design professionals knowledgeable in energy efficiency, energy conservation, building design and construction; environmental advocates with expertise in energy efficiency and conservation; construction and real estate professionals; and representatives of appropriate labor organizations.
